data.title: The Mandarin Mystery
data.meta_description: The Mandarin Mystery is a 1936 American mystery crime film directed by Ralph Staub, loosely based on The Chinese Orange Mystery, a novel featuring detective character Ellery Queen.
data.text:
1936 film by Ralph Staub / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
